caseTitle: Ikramuddin Rajput v. The Inspector General of Police Sindh & others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Dishonest investigation (2) Section 166, 375, 376 & 511 P.P.C. (3) Role of I.O. (4) Section 4 (l) Cr.P.C. read with Rule 25.2 of the Police Rules, 1934 (5) Section 22 of the Anti-Rape (Investigation and Trial) Act, 2021 (6) Rule 2 (v) of the Sindh Police   (E & D) Rules, 1988 (7) Article 4 & 155 of Police Order 2002.
